Astrum Solar <http://www.astrumsolar.com>
Solarize Avon <http://solarizect.com/our-towns/solarize-avon>
Thinking about going solar? The time is now!
Deadline to enroll in the program is March 27. Sign up now to save money!
Don’t miss your opportunity to qualify for free installation and exclusive pricing. Enroll today!
Time is running out to take advantage of Solarize Avon, a special solar initiative run by volunteers in Avon, CT. Through the program, Astrum Solar—the choice installer for the program—is offering a discounted price when you enroll in the program by March 27.
Astrum Solar’s discounted price, in addition to a variety of affordable financing options, make this a great time to go solar! The Connecticut Green Bank has also announced an exciting new promotional offer for new CT Solar Lease customers who meet eligibility requirements—two months of free lease payments! Get more information. <http://www.gosolarct.com/Financing-Options/CT-Solar-Lease>
Contact your solar consultant today to discuss how you can solar with Solarize Avon.
You can start producing your own electricity for less than what you are currently paying your utility company.
Join your neighbors who have already turned their sunny roofs into electricity savings! Call Astrum Solar at 800-903-6130 or visit www.solarizect.com/Avon <http://www.solarizect.com/Avon> today.
Going solar is easy and rewarding. The only thing you have to lose is your electricity bill.
When you go solar with Solarize Avon, your system will be installed by Astrum Solar, the largest residential solar installer headquartered on the East Coast. At Astrum Solar, we provide our customers with a turnkey, worry-free experience. You can sit back and relax while we handle the entire process for you. We guarantee our production estimates and our installation times, so you will be on your way to electricity savings in no time. Plus, you get a lifetime of support for your system. Our turnkey process, combined with exclusive pricing and incentives, make now the perfect time to go solar.
To get started or to re-engage yourself in the solar process, call Astrum Solar at 800-903-6130 or visit www.solarizect.com/Avon <http://www.solarizect.com/Avon> today.
Call Us: 800-903-6130 See a Sunny Day in a Whole New Way®
You’re receiving this email because you’ve expressed interest in Solarize Avon.
You must be a Avon, CT resident to participate in this program. Offers and financing are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates.
